name: anvil
description: Anvil.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that simplifies the creation and management of 2D scenes for web applications. It provides an easy-to-use interface for rendering graphics, handling user input, implementing physics simulations, and incorporating lighting effects.

scripts.build: tsc index.ts && node buildscript.js && node removeGPU.js
scripts.start: npm run build && tsc index.ts && node removeGPU.js && node multiplayer.js
